string.value: FATHER|Rise and shine! I have good news for you on your birthday.
|Good morning, father. I'm all ears.
FATHER|It is a great day for both of us. You are an adult now and may do whatever you want.
FATHER|Of course you’d better ask for your father's permission. Mine, in your case. Do you see this truck? It is yours now.
|I cannot believe it. I'm finally allowed to drive alone!
|I mean, Thank You, sir, father, sir!
FATHER|Yes, but first...
|Wow! I will go to the very edge of the world.
FATHER|Hmm, yes, if you are not afraid to fall over. But first, you must go to Sowth and deliver this packet to Sergo, a friend of mine. Test your driving skills and return immediately.
|Your wish my command!
ALICE|Wait here, till I finish my business.
ALICE|Let’s go.
ALICE|Damn! I know he is here somewhere. Are you sure there are no other settlements in this area?
|Actually, there is one more village, Glukhoe. But you won’t find any customers there.
ALICE|It is up to me to decide. How can I get there?
|It is in the North. Close enough but there is no direct way. We will have to go through Sowth again.
ALICE|I’m tired of following your slow car. From now on, I will go alone. Here’s your reward. Bye!
|She’s so fast… I got to go home.
FELIX|Here you are. Don’t you know that every new trader must pay me taxes? The first payment is 1000 coins.
|Are you crazy? I’ve never seen such a sum!
FELIX|Well, you pay – you live. You don’t pay... Attack him!
FELIX|You gonna pay for this, youngster! Felix will find you anywhere. Retreat!
|I can’t believe my eyes! Everybody’s dead... What a monster could do it?..
|There’s only one thing I can do... Avenge! I will find you, murderer!
|Wait... Felix was angry with me the last time we met. He had the motive and the means to do it... He won’t get away with it!
|I will avenge my father’s death!
FELIX|You? Now you’ll pay for your insolence!
|Is this all you’ve got? Come out and fight like a man!
FELIX|If you want something to be done properly, do it yourself. Let me deal with him.
|You’ll die for your crimes, murderer!
FELIX|Wait. I haven’t killed people for years. We have a deal with locals. You are the one, who’s attacking my fellows!
|You killed my father and destroyed my home!
FELIX|Easy, man. You’re from Glukhoe! Believe me, that was not our gang. Some crazy outlanders did it.
|You lie!
FELIX|I swear on my mother’s tomb! Ask your girlfriend, she saw it all.
|You mean Alice? How can you know?
FELIX|She told us. She visited our camp on her way north, to Pesht. She was scared like hell.
|I see... I will follow her. You are free to go, Felix, but never come back here!
FELIX|This time, you have won. But we’ll meet again when I will be better prepared.
|See ya!
Revolutionary Ed| Now they’ll think twice before attacking our village!
FATHER|My boy... come over here...
|What happened here? Who did it?

FATHER|Listen carefully. I’ve been taking care of you for years... But still, you are an adopted child. These things belonged to your real father, take them. Go find Ben Throttle... He is an Explorer like your dad was. He will help... go... son...
|All my life... What should I do now? Nothing left... and no one... Only this letter
LETTER|''If you are reading this letter, it means I didn’t manage to come back. Sad but true. I know Peter well and have no worriers about your education...''
LETTER|''...My heart hurts by the thought of you becoming a man while I am far away. It is a real torment. But you must know, that I had no other choice but to leave. Too much is at stake..."
LETTER|''...I have to right the wrong. Only by achieving my goal can I prove myself worthy being called father... and husband. I am sorry, son. Forgive me, if you can."

|Is that all? No explanations whatsoever… How can I forgive someone I never blamed? There’s nothing I can do here. Probably Ben will enlighten me. I will find him and then I will decide what to do with my life. I wonder where he lives.
This is the first time you play Hard Trucks: Apocalypse. Do you want to get hints on how to play?
Do you wish to travel to another region?
I don’t know the way, so I’ll better stay here.
There’s something strange about this place. I don’t want to go there.

@ffffffff| History hasn’t kept any certain facts about the Dark Ages that followed the cataclysm. One thing is sure: the thing that saved all humans was a face mask. The creation of an unknown genius protected people from the contaminated air and equalized everyone. This thin barrier between life and imminent death became the symbol of new humanity. Masks united people and gave them strength to fight for the future. || New settlements were founded far from old cities that have become common graves. Little by little, small groups of survivors established trade relations between each other. Simple professions like miners, farmers, traders were in demand. Hard work made people forget about the horrors of the past.|| But nothing can change the nature of man. At all times there were people who saved the wisdom to share it with people. Also there were other ones, who preferred chaos and destruction above all.
